    程序包 说明
    ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield

    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield中Point的使用

      声明为Point的ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield中的字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      Point Overpass.endpointA
      Endpoint A of the overpass.
      Point Overpass.endpointB
      Endpoint B of the overpass.
      Point Region.ll
      The lower left corner of the region.
      Point Region.ur
      The upper right corner of the region.
      返回变量类型为Point的类型的ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static java.util.List<Point> Point.makePointsFromString​(java.lang.String s)
      Makes points from a string, eg "(1,1),(2.5,3)".
      参数类型为Point的ca.mcgill.ecse211.playingfield中的构造器 
      构造器 说明
      Overpass​(Point endpointA, Point endpointB)
      Constructs an Overpass defined by the two endpoints.
      Region​(Point lowerLeft, Point upperRight)
      Constructs a Region.

      返回Point的ca.mcgill.ecse211.project中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明

      Makes a point given a Wi-Fi parameter prefix.
      static Point Resources.waypoint​(int index)
      Convenience method to return a waypoint at the given index.
      返回变量类型为Point的类型的ca.mcgill.ecse211.project中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static java.util.List<Point> Resources.makeWaypoints()
      Makes an ordered list of waypoints from the given Wi-Fi parameters.
      参数类型为Point的ca.mcgill.ecse211.project中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static void Navigation.avoidTravel​(double ultrasonicDistance, Point destination)
      if there is an obstacle on the path, design an available path
      static void Navigation.decideTravelTo​(Point destination)  
      static void Navigation.directTravelTo​(Point destination)
      Travels directly (in a straight line) to the given destination.
      static void Navigation.directTravelTo2​(Point destination)
      direct travel to a point without localizing at the end
      static double Navigation.distanceBetween​(Point p1, Point p2)
      Returns the distance between the two points in tile lengths (feet).
      static double Navigation.getDestinationAngle​(Point current, Point destination)
      Returns the angle that the robot should point towards to face the destination in degrees.
      static void Navigation.travelTo​(Point destination)
      Travels to destination taking obstacles into account.
